root.output

Class OutputJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob
        • root.output.OutputJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public class OutputJob
extends org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob

    This is the driver class for the Data Output directive.

    This job serves to take the data generated by the Hierarchical Affinity Propagation algorithm and consolidate it into a Hive and mySQL database.

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
